All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Crop
all the methods for all crops and counts ase root crops, which can be considered the default crops
Entity
This abstract class was made for modularity's sake in case any Non-player characters are implemented
FarmerType
the type of famer and the bonuses that come with it
Flower
flower crop
FruitTree
fruit trees
GamePanel
this class inherits the jpanel class from swing and the Run implements runnable
Images
this class handles the sprites for the gamem
KeyHandler
is class implements key listener and sets certain values to true when a key event occurs
Main
This class runs the Program
Player
the player class which inherits from entity that can freely act in the space based on the keys pressed
Plot
this class is the Plot, which inherits Tile class,it can be plowed oe planted in
Rock
Rock tiles act as a obstacle that stops you from plowing or planting
Text
Fonts
TextBox
text boxes for the game
Tile
base class for any tiles in the game
TileManager
Manages and creates a 2D list for tiles
